item.title: Vim search visual text
item.description: vim 搜索光标下文字 / substitute 操作同样 Or you can simply yank the selected text with y and go to search mode /, then you can paste the last yanked text with Ctrl+R 0

item.title: Complete Sed Command Guide
item.description: Complete Sed Command Guide [Explained with Practical Examples] In a previous article, I showed the basic usage of Sed, the stream editor, on a practical use case.
